attributes.action: form a Service Union or Association for the Armed Forces ( a representative body for members of the UK Armed Forces that would be eligible to join EUROMIL  )
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In contrast to almost all other European countries UK law not only does not provide any procedure
 
-whereby members of the Armed Forces may make a collective representation to their superiors since at present it is but expressly forbidden and  any attempt to do so is punishable. The Redress of Grievance procedure expressly forbids any complaint by two or more members of the Armed Forces. It also forbids the making of a complaint on behalf of others.

For the reader "Britain and France are now the only countries in Europe which forbid members of the Armed Forces to form any kind of Service Union or Association."  from evidence submitted to the Select Committee for the Armed Forces Bill 2006
